channel.title: jolly data
channel.description: A blog on my personal exploration of open datasets, rstats, python and some more.

item.title: Secret Santa
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: With "Spooky Season" coming to an end, Holiday Season is up next. If you have done Secret Santa rounds before, you might have run into the issue that that someone drew his or her own name from the lots. How often will you have to repeat the drawing until no one draws her or his own name?

item.title: Tea, Earl Grey, Hot
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: My submission for #TidyTuesday 2021 week 34. A look at StarTrek TNG voice interactions with the Enterprise's computer. In this submission I focus on the 'locate' command to find someone on the ship.

item.title: Leaving known waters
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: Over the last weeks and months I have collected three features for the blog itself that I want to implement. Covers: A custom parallax scrolling landing page, Utterances comments and a custom 404 error page. None are built into the {distill} package, so there's some manual work needed. I'll go through the changes here.

item.title: TidyTuesday 2021 week 24: Great Lakes Commercial Fishing
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: An analysis of the commercial fish production in the Great Lakes 1867 - 2015. Using beeswarm plots to produce schools of fish. My very first submission for #TidyTuesday!

item.title: Bundestag Part III: Voting on the edge
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: Leveraging network analysis tools, the voting behaviour of the deputies in the Bundestag shows similarity-clusters across three legislative periods. A visual analysis.

item.title: Bundestag Part II.1 - Go back to start...
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: After further research I found a way to get more data and with better quality.

item.title: Bundestag Part II - Web scraping parliamentary votes
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: The data on roll-call votes is accessible for the public on the bundestag.de website, but not via an API. Web Scraping to the rescue! In this part I will collect the available data and compose a single, full dataset as preparation for the following posts.

item.title: With flying colours
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: After three months of sailing, it is time to adjust the rigging. A refreshed look with a custom color palette, a custom ggplot2 theme and an updated logo and new typography.

item.title: German Bundestag - Part I: members of the parliament
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: An analysis of the german national parliament ("Bundestag"). This first part focuses on biographical data of the elected representatives and the composition of the parliament over time.

item.title: World Of Waste
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: The amount of waste produced every year across the globe is frightening. But there's a glimmer of hope on the horizon.

item.title: Olympic history
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: Participating athletes and medal count in the Modern Olympic Games over 120 years. Analysis of athletes and national teams from 1896 until 2016 and the influence of population and GDP per capita on the medal count of the nations in 2016.

item.title: Setting Sail
item.dc:creator: Christian A. Gebhard
item.description: Make ready for departure, I'm going on a journey.
